security: This document contains personal financial information, including Samuel Ruby's tax returns and business details. Disclosing this information could violate his privacy.
summary: This document consists of Samuel Ruby's letter to the HSCA enclosing copies of his tax returns from 1967 to 1976, along with his 1976 tax return forms and schedules, detailing his income, deductions, and business activities related to the Woodley Bistro Coffee Shop.
summary_one_paragraph: In a letter dated January 24, 1978, Samuel Ruby informs the HSCA of providing xerox copies of his tax returns from 1967 to 1976, noting the unavailability of returns from 1962 to 1966. The document further includes Ruby's 1976 U.S. Individual Income Tax Return (Form 1040) with accompanying schedules (A, B, C) which detail his income sources, deductions, and tax payments along with Form 5329 for Individual Retirement Savings Arrangement, illustrating his financial status and business operation of Woodley Bistro Coffee Shop. He includes NOTE ON WOODLEY BISTRO
title: JFK Assassination System Identification Form - Samuel Ruby Tax Returns and Letter
